sent.orig: Rice had to scratch Egypt off her itinerary because of swelling support for Hizbullah there.
sent.trans: Rice不得不取消了埃及之行，因为那里对真主党的支持力度日益加大。

sent.orig: Environmental factor such as the amount of water supply is also considered in the L-RICE.
sent.trans: 像供水量这样的环境因素也作为对象包括在了L-RICE里。

sent.orig: Now that he had a mobile studio, Rice set about recording the songs properly.
sent.trans: 现在他有一个移动工作室，Rice开始适当地着手录制歌曲。

sent.orig: Station like this including KTRU at Rice University in Huston are known as public broadcasters.
sent.trans: 像Rice大学KTRU这样的电台是公众所知的公众电台。

sent.orig: Along the way, Rice enthuses about a global warming lecture he recently attended.
sent.trans: 在路上，Rice对于他最近参加的一个全球变暖的讲座很有热情。
